column3:
> Fixes new -Wshadow (#8105) warning from #8606:

Looks like these are being introduced faster than they can be cleaned up...

So maybe it's time to enable this warning in the default bulid?

Anyhow, executables match, ACK 125b946
Not yet, I think. There are approx. 500 of these warnings in Qt 8)\n
Is it possible to only compile everything not UI with -Wshadow ?\n
There surely is a way to disable `-Wshadow` for qt ;-)\n

We shouldn't be making lots of changes to local variable names because they conflict with a global variable. That's just treating the symptoms, we need to address the root cause, which is the large number of globals.\n
There is almost no change like you describe (`tableRPC` being an exception). You are stating pure truth though.\n
